problem_text:
21.67. Suppose that φ is an automorphism of a finite soluble group G, and let r be the (Prüfer) rank of the fixed-point subgroup CG(φ). Is the Fitting height of G bounded terms of |φ| and r?
This is known to be true in the case where |φ| is a product of at most two prime powers (B. Hartley, MIMS EPrint: 2014.52 http://eprints.ma.man.ac.uk/2188/01/covered/MIMS_ep2014_52.pdf). An affirmative answer to this question would imply an affirmative answer to 13.8(b).
E. I. Khukhro
